00035         private void btn_accept_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00036         {
00037             mySqlConn conn = new mySqlConn();
00038             conn.connect();
00039             // We launch the query
00040             string md5Hash = Utils.CreateMD5Hash(txt_password.Text.Trim());
00041             List<Hashtable> lhResultset = conn.lhSqlQuery("Select * from users where login='" + txt_username.Text + "' and password = '" + md5Hash + "' and active = 1");
00042             
00043             // Check if we found the user
00044             if ((int)lhResultset.Count != 1)
00045                 MessageBox.Show("The username or password are wrong, please use the correct credentials and try it again");
00046             else
00047             {
00048                 m_parent.ShowUserOptions(lhResultset[0]["profile"].ToString());
00049                 this.Close();
00050             }
00051 
00052         }
